welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Molesey, United Kingdom! Known for its picturesque views and rich history, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Heathrow, primarily used by British Airways and a few other airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Heathrow, also known as the Queen's Terminal, mainly used by Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A popular terminal for long-haul flights, used by many international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Heathrow, used by a variety of airlines, including SkyTeam members.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The main terminal at Heathrow, used by British Airways and a few other airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also offered for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Northolt Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and personalized experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary Wi-Fi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Biggin Hill Airport caters to VIP and private flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gatwick Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The second terminal at Gatwick Airport, mainly serving international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport is a modern and efficient hub for domestic and European flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at London City Airport offers luxury amenities and services for private jet travelers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport, with no time limit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Farnborough Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Farnborough Airport caters to the needs of private jet owners and passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackbushe Airport serves all commercial flights and provides a range of amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
